description.message: Make automatic micropayments on the web with Flattr.

popup_beta_auto_description_disabled.message: Help improve Flattr by sending us some anonymized data.

popup_beta_auto_description_enabled.message: You've agreed to send some anonymized data to Flattr.

flattrAuth_message.message: Oops! It looks like you've signed out of your Flattr account. Please sign in to continue flattring your favorite online content.

popup_message_blocked_url.message: This particular page cannot be flattred. Other pages on this site can be flattred.

options_beta_description.message: By clicking the button below, you hereby declare that some anonymized (except for multiauthor domains) extension data (as specified here) will be transferred to us and processed for the purpose of improving the extension and the underlying algorithm. We do not combine the collected data with any other information about you. The data we collect is statistical data, therefore we do not know who generated it.

options_beta_export_footnote.message: Data that is manually exported is not anonymized.

options_beta_intro.message: Your participation helps us, among other things, identify and fix issues, and evaluate the overall user experience.

options_beta_optin.message: To opt in, click the button below:

options_beta_revocation.message: You can revoke your consent at any time by visiting this page and clicking the button below.

notification_disabledFirst_description.message:
By default, Flattr is not switched on for this site. This means that this site will not earn flattrs.
Want to flattr this site? Simply click the toggle to enable Flattr for this site.

notification_disabledFirst_title.message: This site will not be flattred.

notification_disabledSomeRevisited_descr.message:
You seem to visit this site often. It could be earning flattrs, but Flattr is disabled.
You can click the toggle at any time to enable Flattr on this site.

notification_disabledSomeRevisited_title.message: Would you like to flattr this site?

notification_flattrFirst_description.message:
Your Flattr button fills up automatically as you browse a site. When full, a flattr is given!
Don't want to wait? Simply click the Flattr button whenever you'd like to give another flattr!

notification_flattrFirst_title.message: Awesome! You just flattred a site!

notification_flattrFirstAuthor_descripti.message:
On sites with many contributors (like this one), only the individual creators earn Flattrs.
The site itself does not earn flattrs.

notification_flattrFirstAuthor_title.message: Nice! You just flattred a content creator!

notification_flattrFirstRevisited_descri.message:
This site earned a flattr because you've visited this site several times this month.
From now on, this site will be automatically flattred when you visit it, even if you don't manually flattr any content.

notification_flattrSome_description.message:
To see which sites have earned flattrs since you started, click the Flattr Dashboard button.
It's really that simple.

flattr_subscription_message.message: Keep in mind that without an active subscription, your favorite creators won't receive any money from you. Any flattrs made without an active subscription will not be converted into money.
